newsitem.title: TURKMENISTAN: US Eximbank loans to Turkmens reach $200 mln.
newsitem.headline: US Eximbank loans to Turkmens reach $200 mln.

text.p: The Export-Import Bank of the United States has so far granted Turkmenistan loans worth $200 million to help modernise its economy, a U.S. embassy official said on Monday.
The official the loans had been used to purchase agricultural machinery, to modernise a thermal power station in Bezmein near the Turkmen capital Ashgabat and to buy two Boeing passenger airplanes.
"All of these loans have been granted on a long-term basis," the diplomat said, adding that the the Turkmen government had provided guarantees for the loans.
